DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and effectiveness of vildagliptin, an unapproved drug, compared to placebo in lowering post-meal blood glucose levels in people with pre-diabetes who have high blood sugar levels after meals.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Vildagliptin in Subjects With Impaired Glucose Tolerance
DOC.criteria: Blood glucose criteria must be met Body mass index (BMI) in the range 2345 Diagnosis of diabetes Serious cardiovascular events within the past 6 months Use of insulin or any oral antidiabetic agent Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
